venue.name: College Woods at East Rock Park

item.description:
Open Sky Yoga

Come relax & rejuvenate after work every Wed & Fri in May with gentle yoga and meditation classes under the towering oak trees of College Woods / East Rock Park.

Practice outdoors in the open air with sunlight glimmering through the trees. Practice outside gives you the chance and the challenge to be deliberately present in nature – not the easiest thing to do in the city!

Bring a blanket to sit or lie on during practice. Mats are not necessary. Includes refreshing cup of tea after class.

The weather dictates the schedule. Take advantage of these outdoor practices while you can!

These classes are open to all levels. $10 per person.


This class happens every Wed or Fri, so if you can't make it to one class, just join us the next time.

We will not meet on Friday May 24 for Memorial Day Weekend!


Class Location...
Near the green bench on the west side of the park toward the corner of Cold Spring & Livingston Streets.

Rain or wet weather conditions will cancel class.
Stay up-to-date... Call 203.901.7393 for more info.
item.how_to_find_us: Near the green bench on west side of the park toward corner of Cold Spring & Livingston St.
item.name: Open Sky Yoga
